FieldType.Name: BFD_DIP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of Destination IP entry for BFD endpoints

FieldType.Name: BFD_MEP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Part of key for OAMA or OAMB table for BFD endpoints

FieldType.Name: OAMP_ENTRY_ID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of quarter entry on OAMP MEP DB table. The first 8 banks are accessed with OAM-ID.

FieldType.Name: OAMP_MEP_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: The supported types of BFD/OAM in OAMP

EnumVal.Name: ETH_OAM
EnumVal.Description: Ethernet OAM.

EnumVal.Name: Y1731_MPLSTP
EnumVal.Description: Y1731 OAM over MPLS-TP.

EnumVal.Name: Y1731_PWE
EnumVal.Description: Y1731 OAM over PWE.

EnumVal.Name: BFD_IPV4_1HOP
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv4 single-hop.

EnumVal.Name: BFD_IPV4_MHOP
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv4 multi-hop.

EnumVal.Name: BFD_MPLS
EnumVal.Description: BFD over MPLS.

EnumVal.Name: BFD_PWE
EnumVal.Description: BFD over PWE.

EnumVal.Name: LM_DB
EnumVal.Description: Loss measurement database entry (last occurence - required for LM.)

EnumVal.Name: LM_STAT
EnumVal.Description: Loss measurement statistics entry (counters - optional for LM.)

EnumVal.Name: DM_STAT
EnumVal.Description: Delay measurement statistics entry.

EnumVal.Name: EXT_DATA_HDR
EnumVal.Description: Extra data header entry.

EnumVal.Name: EXT_DATA_PLD
EnumVal.Description: Extra data payload (more bits for 80 byte extra data) entry.

EnumVal.Name: DM_STAT_ONE_WAY
EnumVal.Description: One-way-day measurment statistics entry.

EnumVal.Name: OFFLOADED_SECOND_ENTRY
EnumVal.Description: Optional second entry for offloaded endpoints.

FieldType.Name: BFD_TX_RATE_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Rate of BFD packet transmission

FieldType.Name: ITMH_TC_DP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Packet priority - mapped ITMH TC/DP

FieldType.Name: YOUR_DISC
FieldType.OneLineDescription: The discriminator value to put on transmitted packets

FieldType.Name: BFD_SRC_IP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Pointer to a source IP address

FieldType.Name: IP_TTL_TOS_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: IPv4 Type of Service bits

FieldType.Name: BFD_FLAGS_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of entry in BFD flags profile table

FieldType.Name: BFD_STATE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: BFD session state

FieldType.Name: DETECT_MULT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Detect multiplier. Fail time=DM*Expected Tx Rate

FieldType.Name: MIN_INTERVAL_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of entry in BFD interval table

FieldType.Name: FEC_ID_OR_GLOB_OUT_LIF
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Field can be used as a destination FEC or Global OutLIF (pointer to EEDB table)

FieldType.Name: BFD_DIAG_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of entry in BFD diag profile table.

FieldType.Name: MEP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: MEP profile, points to entry that contains more endpoint properties (most LM/DM).

FieldType.Name: MEP_PE_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: MEP PE profile, may be used by OAMP-PE for program selection and other variables.

FieldType.Name: MEP_DB_BANK
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Num of banks in MEP-DB.

FieldType.Name: IP_SUBNET_LEN
FieldType.OneLineDescription: For BFD one-hop, number of MSB's to check in received packets

FieldType.Name: CCM_INTERVAL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index to look up Tx rate in appropriate register. Configured statistically via profile.

EnumVal.Name: NO_TX
EnumVal.Description: No CCM packet transmission.

EnumVal.Name: 3MS
EnumVal.Description: 3 millisecond interval.

EnumVal.Name: 10MS
EnumVal.Description: 10 millisecond interval.

EnumVal.Name: 100MS
EnumVal.Description: 100 millisecond interval.

EnumVal.Name: 1S
EnumVal.Description: 1 second interval.

EnumVal.Name: 10S
EnumVal.Description: 10 second interval.

EnumVal.Name: 1M
EnumVal.Description: 1 minute interval.

EnumVal.Name: 10M
EnumVal.Description: 10 minute interval.

FieldType.Name: MAID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: MAID for OAM packet (minimal)

FieldType.Name: OAM_ENDPOINT_ID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Endpoint ID equivalent to bcm_oam_endpoint_t

FieldType.Name: BFD_ENDPOINT_ID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Endpoint ID equivalent to bcm_bfd_endpoint_t

FieldType.Name: SHORT_ICC_INDEX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of ICC based MAID

Define.Name: SHORT_FORMAT
Define.Description: Value used to indicate 2 character short MA format

FieldType.Name: NOF_VLAN_TAGS
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Encapsulation profile. 0 - no VLAN tags

FieldType.Name: UP_PTCH_OPAQUE_PT_ATTR_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Profile to use in the PTCH-2 Opaque-PT-Attr field in case of up mep injection

FieldType.Name: PORT_STATUS_TLV_EN
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Enable port status TLV injection

FieldType.Name: PORT_STATUS_TLV_VAL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Value of port status TLV

FieldType.Name: INTERFACE_STATUS_TLV_CODE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: 0 - no interface status TLV

FieldType.Name: LMM_DA_LSB_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of entry in OAMP_LMM_DA_NIC_TABLE

FieldType.Name: LMM_DA_MSB_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index to choose one of the 8 profiles in OAMP_LMM_DA_OUI register

FieldType.Name: SA_GEN_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: CCM Source MAC MSB bits Profile

FieldType.Name: DA_UC_MC_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Destination address: 1-multicase 0-unicast

FieldType.Name: DELAY_DM
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Delay values for DMM/DMR packets

FieldType.Name: LAST_ENTRY
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Used for OAMP flexible LM/DM packets

FieldType.Name: EXT_DATA_LENGTH
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Number of entries of extra data, including this one

FieldType.Name: OPCODES_TO_PREPEND
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Bitmap defining which opcodes are prepended with the data entry

FieldType.Name: CRC16
FieldType.OneLineDescription: 16-bit CRC value to compare to automatic OAMP calculation for received packets

FieldType.Name: EXTRA_DATA_SEGMENT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: One fourth of the extra data bits

FieldType.Name: LM_MY_TX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Local LM count for transmitted packets

FieldType.Name: LM_MY_RX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Local LM count for recevied packets

FieldType.Name: LM_PEER_TX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Remote LM count for transmitted packets

FieldType.Name: LM_PEER_RX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Remote LM count for recevied packets

FieldType.Name: LM_CNTRS_VALID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Should be initialized to 0, and then read only. Will be set to 1 when first LMR packet recieved

FieldType.Name: LAST_LM_FAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Last loss measurement value from far endpoint

FieldType.Name: LAST_LM_NEAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Last loss measurement value from near endpoint

FieldType.Name: ACC_LM_FAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Accumulated far endpoint packet losses

FieldType.Name: ACC_LM_NEAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Accumulated near endpoint packet losses

FieldType.Name: MAX_LM_FAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Highest number packet losses from a single far endpoint

FieldType.Name: MAX_LM_NEAR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Highest number packet losses from a single near endpoint

FieldType.Name: ACH_SEL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Select one of 4 ACH

FieldType.Name: MEASURE_NEXT_RECEIVED_SLR
FieldType.OneLineDescription: 0 - Do not measure the next received SLR

FieldType.Name: TIMESTAMP_FORMAT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Format of timestamp to use in Tx packet

EnumVal.Name: TS_NTP
EnumVal.Description: Use NTP timestamp format.

EnumVal.Name: TS_1588
EnumVal.Description: Use 1588 timestamp format.

FieldType.Name: OAMP_ERROR_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Format of timestamp to use in Tx packet

EnumVal.Name: ERR_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Egress error

EnumVal.Name: CHAN_TYPE_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Illegal GACH channel type

EnumVal.Name: TYPE_MISS
EnumVal.Description: legal trap does not match entry type

EnumVal.Name: EMC_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Exact Match Core(For CCM miss in rsp_tcam and (miss in RMEP tcam or lookup error))

EnumVal.Name: MAID_MISS
EnumVal.Description: MAID miss

EnumVal.Name: FLEX_CRC_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Flexible CRC check miss

EnumVal.Name: MDL_MISS
EnumVal.Description: MDL miss

EnumVal.Name: CCM_INTRVL_MISS
EnumVal.Description: CCM interval miss

EnumVal.Name: ERR_MY_DISC_MISS
EnumVal.Description: My Discriminator miss (BFD)

EnumVal.Name: ERR_SRC_IP_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Source IP address miss (BFD)

EnumVal.Name: ERR_YOUR_DISC_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Your Discriminator miss (BFD)

EnumVal.Name: SRC_PORT_MISS
EnumVal.Description: UDP source port miss (BFD)

EnumVal.Name: RMEP_STATE_CHANGE
EnumVal.Description: Current state change in the RMEP DB

EnumVal.Name: PARITY_ERROR
EnumVal.Description: Parity error occurred whether in the MEP DB or the RMEP DB read

EnumVal.Name: DEBUG
EnumVal.Description: No error,but bit all packets send to CPU(debug )

EnumVal.Name: TIMESTAMP_MISS
EnumVal.Description: tod32msb does not match the OAM-TS (the time difference is above 1 sec)

EnumVal.Name: TRAP_CODE_MISS
EnumVal.Description: Trap code is different from expected

FieldType.Name: SESSION_IDENTIFIER
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Uniquely identifies a mesurment operation sequence of messages

FieldType.Name: LM_DS_FIELD

FieldType.Name: DM_T_FLAG

FieldType.Name: FULL_DELAY

FieldType.Name: PORT_CORE

EnumVal.Name: CCM_TYPE

FieldType.Name: LIFETIME_UNITS

EnumVal.Name: SCAN_PERIOD_100

EnumVal.Description: Opcode count idex for LMM/SLM/1SL/RFC6374-LM-Query

EnumVal.Name: LMR_OPCODE_INDEX

FieldType.OneLineDescription: MIP with a higher MDL than in OAM packet exists in LIF

FieldType.Name: PACKET_IS_BFD
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Incoming packet has BFD structure

FieldType.Name: MDL_MP_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Search result for OAM endpoints with a specific MDL in a LIF

EnumVal.Name: NO_MEP
EnumVal.Description: No MEPs in this LIF for MDL

EnumVal.Name: MIP
EnumVal.Description: MIP in this LIF for MDL

EnumVal.Name: ACTIVE_MEP
EnumVal.Description: Active MEP in this LIF for MDL

EnumVal.Name: PASSIVE_MEP
EnumVal.Description: Passive MEP in this LIF for MDL

EnumVal.Description: Counter value

EnumVal.Name: TOD_1588
EnumVal.Description: 1588 Time of Day

EnumVal.Name: TOD_NTP
EnumVal.Description: NTP Time of Day

FieldType.Name: EGRESS_OAM_DATA_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Data type(Ingress) to be stamped on OAM Application Extension(oam_ts_data)

EnumVal.Name: TOD_NTP
EnumVal.Description: NTP Time of Day

EnumVal.Name: TOD_1588
EnumVal.Description: 1588 Time of Day

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_VALUE
EnumVal.Description: Counter value

FieldType.Name: NOF_MEP_BELOW_MDL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Number of MEPs with lower MDL than packet in LIF

FieldType.Name: OAM_LIF_DB_ACCESS
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Access number to OAM-LIF-DB. Possible values: 0, 1, or 2

FieldType.Name: NOF_MEP_ABOVE_MDL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Number of MEPs with higher MDL than packet in LIF

FieldType.Name: OAM_INJECT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Signals that processed packet is injected packet

FieldType.Name: OAM_MY_CFM_MAC
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Signals that MAC equals MEP's MAC

FieldType.Name: OAM_DA_IS_MC
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Signals MultiCast packet

FieldType.Name: OAM_INGRESS_UP_MEP
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Signals that an UP-MEP was hit

FieldType.Name: OAM_INGRESS_METER_DISABLE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Disable Metering

FieldType.Name: OAM_DIRECTION
FieldType.OneLineDescription: OAM sub-type

EnumVal.Name: DOWN_MEP
EnumVal.Description: MEP that injects to egress and receives in ingress

EnumVal.Name: UP_MEP
EnumVal.Description: MEP that injects to ingress and receives in egress

FieldType.Name: OAM_PROCESS_ACTION
FieldType.OneLineDescription: OAM process action

EnumVal.Name: NONE
EnumVal.Description: No action to take

EnumVal.Name: INGRESS_STAMP_1588
EnumVal.Description: Add 1588 time of day stamp in ingress

EnumVal.Name: EGRESS_STAMP_1588
EnumVal.Description: Add 1588 time of day stamp in egress

EnumVal.Name: INGRESS_STAMP_NTP
EnumVal.Description: Add NTP time of day stamp in ingress

EnumVal.Name: EGRESS_STAMP_NTP
EnumVal.Description: Add NTP time of day stamp in egress

EnumVal.Name: STAMP_COUNTER
EnumVal.Description: Add counter stamp

EnumVal.Name: READ_COUNTER_AND_STAMP
EnumVal.Description: Add read counter and stamp

FieldType.Name: MP_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Type of the packet in relation to existing MEPs on most inner LIF

EnumVal.Name: BELOW_LOWER_MEP
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet is below the lowest MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: ACTIVE_MATCH_LOW
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the 3rd MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: PASSIVE_MATCH_LOW
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the 3rd MEP level on lif on the opposite direction

EnumVal.Name: BETWEEN_MIDDLE_AND_LOW
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet is between the 2nd and 3rd MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: ACTIVE_MATCH_MIDDLE
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the 2nd MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: PASSIVE_MATCH_MIDDLE
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the 2nd MEP level on lif on the opposite direction

EnumVal.Name: BETWEEN_HIGH_AND_MIDDLE
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet is between the Highest and the 2nd MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: ACTIVE_MATCH_HIGH
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the highest MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: PASSIVE_MATCH_HIGH
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches the highest MEP level on lif on the opposite direction

EnumVal.Name: ABOVE_UPPER_MEP
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet is higher than the highest MEP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: MIP_MATCH
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches than the highest MIP level on lif

EnumVal.Name: BFD
EnumVal.Description: The packet matches the BFD endpoint on lif

EnumVal.Name: BETWEEN_MIP_AND_MEP
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet is higher than the highest MEP level in lif, but lower than a MIP

EnumVal.Name: ACTIVE_MATCH_NO_COUNTER
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches a MEP on lif without counter assigned

EnumVal.Name: PASSIVE_MATCH_NO_COUNTER
EnumVal.Description: MDL of the packet matches a MEP on lif without counter assigned, on the opposite direction

EnumVal.Name: ETH_LMR

EnumVal.Name: ETH_DMR

EnumVal.Name: ETH_DMM

EnumVal.Name: ETH_1DM

EnumVal.Name: ETH_SLM

EnumVal.Name: ETH_SLR

EnumVal.Name: ETH_AIS

EnumVal.Name: ETH_LINEAR_APS

EnumVal.Name: OAM_LIF_1

EnumVal.Description: The second LIF (starting from most inner) recognized with OAM-LIF bit set

EnumVal.Name: OAM_LIF
EnumVal.Description: The first LIF (most inner) recognized with OAM-LIF bit set

EnumVal.Name: HIGH

FieldType.Name: IS_OAM_LIF_1

FieldType.Name: IS_OAM_LIF_2
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Third LIF is OAM LIF

FieldType.Name: OAM_FORMAT_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: OAM format type used in OAM channel type table

EnumVal.Name: Y1731
EnumVal.Description: Y1731 format type

EnumVal.Name: BFD_RAW
EnumVal.Description: BFD format type

EnumVal.Name: BFD_IPV4
EnumVal.Description: BFD IPV4 format type - currently not supported

EnumVal.Name: BFD_IPV6
EnumVal.Description: BFD IPV6 format type - currently not supported

EnumVal.Name: RFC_6374
EnumVal.Description: RFC 6374 format type - currently not supported

FieldType.Name: OAM_MAID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: OAM Maintenance Association Identifier

FieldType.Name: GROUP_ID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: determines if mcdb entry used for ingress

FieldType.Name: IN_LIF_VALID_FOR_LM
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Most inner LIF has MEP with LM set

FieldType.Name: NOF_VALID_LM_LIFS
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Number of LIFs with LM-MEP is set

FieldType.Name: YOUR_DISC_VALID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Is BFD classification based on Your-Discriminator value

FieldType.Name: OAM_GROUP_ID
FieldType.OneLineDescription: OAM group id

FieldType.Name: BFD_YOUR_DISCR_RANGE_MIN
FieldType.OneLineDescription: The lower limit for your-discriminator field in incoming BFD packets

FieldType.Name: BFD_YOUR_DISCR_RANGE_MAX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: The upper limit for your-discriminator field in incoming BFD packets

FieldType.Name: BCM_BFD_TUNNEL_TYPE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Types of BFD MEP tunneling

EnumVal.Name: UDP
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv4/v6.

EnumVal.Name: IPV4IN4
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv4-in-IPv4 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: IPV6IN4
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv6-in-IPv4 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: IPV4IN6
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv4-in-IPv6 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: IPV6IN6
EnumVal.Description: BFD over IPv6-in-IPv6 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: GRE4IN4
EnumVal.Description: BFD over GRE IPv4-in-IPv4 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: MPLS
EnumVal.Description: BFD over MPLS LSP.

EnumVal.Name: PWE_CONTROL_WORD
EnumVal.Description: BFD over PW with CW.

EnumVal.Name: PWE_ROUTER_ALERT
EnumVal.Description: BFD over PW with Router Alert.

EnumVal.Name: PWE_TTL
EnumVal.Description: BFD over PW with TTL=1.

EnumVal.Name: MPLS_TP_CC
EnumVal.Description: BFD for MPLS-TP proactive CC.

EnumVal.Name: MPLS_TP_CC_CV
EnumVal.Description: BFD for MPLS-TP proactive CC and CV.

EnumVal.Name: GRE6IN4
EnumVal.Description: BFD over GRE IPv6-in-IPv4 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: GRE4IN6
EnumVal.Description: BFD over GRE IPv4-in-IPv6 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: GRE6IN6
EnumVal.Description: BFD over GRE IPv6-in-IPv6 tunnel.

EnumVal.Name: PWE_GAL
EnumVal.Description: BFD over PW with GAL, GACH.

EnumVal.Name: MPLS_PHP
EnumVal.Description: BFD over MPLS LSP and PHP.

EnumVal.Name: COUNT
EnumVal.Description: BFD total number of tunnel types.

FieldType.Name: COUNTER_INTERFACE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: The HW device that is supposed to access the counter

FieldType.Name: ICC_MAP_INDEX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of ICC based MAID map data

FieldType.Name: ICC_DATA
FieldType.OneLineDescription: ICC data of Y1731 OAM ICC based MAID - bytes 0:5 of MA name.

FieldType.Name: OAMP_MEP_DB_INDEX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Index of OAMP MEP DB entry.Same is used to access UMC table as well

FieldType.Name: UMC
FieldType.OneLineDescription: UMC table for Y1731 OAM with ICC based MAID- bytes 6:10 of MA name.

FieldType.Name: PROFILE_RX_STATE_UPDATE_EN
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different modes of RX state updates

EnumVal.Name: DONT_UPDATE_STATE_RDI_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Do not update state and RDI according to received packet; generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_STATE_RDI_DONT_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Update state and RDI according to received packet; don't generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_STATE_RDI_IF_FIFO_NOT_FULL_GEN_PKT
EnumVal.Description: Update state and RDI only if event FIFO is not full; generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_STATE_RDI_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Update state and RDI regardless of event FIFO; generate event.

FieldType.Name: PROFILE_SCAN_STATE_UPDATE_EN
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different modes of Scan state updates

EnumVal.Name: DONT_UPDATE_RMEP_DB_STATE_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Do not update rmep_db state on scan; generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_RMEP_DB_STATE_DONT_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Update rmep_db state on scan; don't generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_RMEP_DB_STATE_IF_FIFO_NOT_FULL_GEN_PKT
EnumVal.Description: Update rmep_db state only if event FIFO is not full; generate event.

EnumVal.Name: UPD_RMEP_DB_STATE_GEN_PACKET
EnumVal.Description: Update rmep_db state regardless of event FIFO; generate event.

FieldType.Name: LM_MODE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different modes of Scan state updates

EnumVal.Name: LM_MODE_INVALID
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is not configured

EnumVal.Name: LM_MODE_IS_LM
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is LM

EnumVal.Name: LM_MODE_IS_SLM
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is SLM

EnumVal.Name: LM_MODE_IS_DUAL_ENDED
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is DualEnded

EnumVal.Name: LM_MODE_IS_NONE
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is LM None

FieldType.Name: DM_MODE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different DM time formats

EnumVal.Name: DM_MODE_INVALID
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile is not configured

EnumVal.Name: DM_MODE_IS_1588
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile time format is 1588

EnumVal.Name: DM_MODE_IS_NTP
EnumVal.Description: MP_Profile time format is NTP

FieldType.Name: TOS
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Type of service for OAM/BFD

FieldType.Name: LOC_EVENT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different states of LOC event

EnumVal.Name: NO_LOC_EVENT
EnumVal.Description: Indicates there was no LOC event

EnumVal.Name: LOC_EVENT
EnumVal.Description: Indicates there was a LOC event

EnumVal.Name: ALMOST_LOC_EVENT
EnumVal.Description: Indicates there was an almost LOC event

EnumVal.Name: LOC_CLEAR_EVENT
EnumVal.Description: Indicates the previous LOC event was cleared

FieldType.Name: JR2_OAMP_EVENT_FORMAT
FieldType.OneLineDescription: JR2 OAMP event format.

StructField.Name: RMEP_INDEX
StructField.Description: Pointer to the OAMP_RMEP_DB for the RMEP for which event was raised

StructField.Name: LOC_EVENT
StructField.Description: 00 - No LOC event 01 - LOC event 10 - Almost LOC event 11 - LOC Clear event

StructField.Name: RMEP_STATE_CHANGE
StructField.Description: Indicates there is a change in RMEP state

StructField.Name: RESERVED_1
StructField.Description: Set to 0 if VALID entry. Else set to 3.

StructField.Name: RMEP_STATE
StructField.Description: If RMEP_STATE_CHANGE is true, this gives the changed RMEP STATE

FieldType.Name: LOCAL_PORT_2_SYSTEM_PORT_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Profile index of a system port for an OAM/BFD endpoint

FieldType.Name: OFFLOADED_MEP_TYPE_SUFFIX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different types of LM/DM offloaded OAM MEPs

EnumVal.Name: CCM_ETHERNET
EnumVal.Description: Offloaded CCM ethernet MEP

EnumVal.Name: MPLSTP
EnumVal.Description: Offloaded OAM on MPLSTP MEP

EnumVal.Name: PWE
EnumVal.Description: Offloaded OAM on PWE MEP

FieldType.Name: SHORT_OAM_ENTRY_MEP_TYPE_SUFFIX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different types of short entry OAM MEPs

EnumVal.Name: CCM_ETHERNET
EnumVal.Description: Short entry CCM ethernet MEP

EnumVal.Name: MPLSTP
EnumVal.Description: Short entry OAM on MPLSTP MEP

EnumVal.Name: PWE
EnumVal.Description: Short entry OAM on PWE MEP

FieldType.Name: SHORT_BFD_ENTRY_MEP_TYPE_SUFFIX
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Different types of short entry OAM MEPs

EnumVal.Name: INVALID
EnumVal.Description: Placeholder for 0. Not allowed in table

EnumVal.Name: 1_HOP
EnumVal.Description: Short entry single hop BFD on IPv4 MEP

EnumVal.Name: M_HOP
EnumVal.Description: Short entry multi hop BFD on IPv4 MEP

EnumVal.Name: MPLS
EnumVal.Description: Short entry BFD on MPLS MEP

EnumVal.Name: PWE
EnumVal.Description: Short entry BFD on PWE MEP

FieldType.Name: RDI_GEN_METHOD
FieldType.OneLineDescription: RDI generation Method

EnumVal.Name: RDI_DEFAULT
EnumVal.Description: Always send CCM with RDI=0

EnumVal.Name: RDI_FROM_SCANNER
EnumVal.Description: Take RDI from Scanner:RDI will be set only if RMEP is in LOC

EnumVal.Name: RDI_FROM_RX
EnumVal.Description: Take RDI from RX processing of CCM:RDI will be set only if received CCM has RDI bit set

EnumVal.Name: RDI_FROM_BOTH
EnumVal.Description: Consider RDI from both Scanner and RX processing of CCM:(Scanner RDI | RX Processing RDI)

FieldType.Name: OPCODE_RATE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Y1731 opcode transmission rate.

FieldType.Name: OPCODE_MDL
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Y1731 opcode MDL to be added to OAMP_MEP_DB.mdl

FieldType.Name: DM_ONE_WAY_TIMESTAMP_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: One way time stamp representation in OAMP

EnumVal.Name: ENCODING_2_WAY
EnumVal.Description: This profile is used for two way delay

EnumVal.Name: ENCODING_1_WAY_FORMAT1
EnumVal.Description: 1WAY format1:9b for seconds, 20b for sub-seconds

EnumVal.Name: ENCODING_1_WAY_FORMAT2
EnumVal.Description: 1WAY format1:7b for seconds, 22b for sub-seconds

EnumVal.Name: ENCODING_1_WAY_FORMAT3
EnumVal.Description: 1WAY format1:5b for seconds, 24b for sub-seconds

EnumVal.Name: ENCODING_1_WAY_FORMAT4
EnumVal.Description: 1WAY format1:3b for seconds, 26b for sub-seconds

FieldType.Name: OAM_PRIORITY_MAP_PROFILE
FieldType.OneLineDescription: Priority Map for Egress TC to OAM_PCP conversion
